data.eml:eml: Morphology of the prothorax and procoxa in the New World Cryptocephalini (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cryptocephalinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chamorro-Lacayo, Maria Lourdes, Konstantinov, Alexander S. (2004): Morphology of the prothorax and procoxa in the New World Cryptocephalini (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cryptocephalinae). Zootaxa 676: 1-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.158400
